function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Risk of contagious diseases propagation in the built environment due to urban policies and proximity perspectives","Impact":"Potential for widespread transmission of diseases, leading to health and economic crises","Mitigation":"Implementation of strict public health measures, vaccination campaigns, and spatial reorganization","Technologies":"Advanced health monitoring systems, contact tracing apps, and air filtration systems","People":"Urban residents, small business owners, and vulnerable populations","Owner":"Government authorities, public health agencies, and urban planning organizations"}]}
